# MouseModifiers Type Alias

> [!CAUTION]
> This alias is still in pre-release.  Its signature may change or it may be removed in future releases.

Input modifier states for mouse actions

## Declaration
`export declare type MouseModifiers = {
    alt: boolean;
    ctrl: boolean;
    shift: boolean;
};`
